marklogic.body:
Glad to learn that Bruce Love is alone in "liking" this convoluted and self-aggrandizing justification.Â You can certainly look to him as a reliable ally on this forum.Â Beyond that, I don't know.
A good definition of a troll is someone who tries to hijack a real or serious issue or topic and make himself the center of attention.Â Here we have a tragic, shocking and Cold-blooded murder and you immediately inject your infantile "poll" into the discussion.Â What a disgrace.Â Thank you Lance and Berkeleyside for taking down this drivel.
And for what it's worth, it's a bit farfetched to presume that the 34 people who supposedly participated in your so-called "poll" were necessarily taking it or you "seriously"...
